did.unittitle: Henry E. Abt "A Study of Wholesale Trades Under N.R.A." Manuscript
did.abstract: "A Study of Wholesale Trades under the National Recovery Administration" by Howard Edward Abt of the Industry Studies Section, within the U.S. Department of Commerce's Office of the National Recovery Administration, Division of Review. 547 pages.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of one bound volume, "A Study of Wholesale Trades under the National Recovery Administration." Authored by Howard Edward Abt of the Industry Studies Section, within the U.S. Department of Commerce's Office of the National Recovery Administration, Division of Review, the study was completed on March 19, 1936.

According to a note in the volume, the study is "the unedited triplicate copy of the manuscript which the author retained when the others were filed for review and publication. Such changes as will appear in the mimeographed edition were effected by editors and reviewers after the original manuscript was tendered by the author to M.D. Vincent, Coordinator of the Industry Studies Section." The volume is 547 pages.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
